text: Deltocephalini is a tribe of leafhoppers in the subfamily Deltocephalinae. ==Genera== Genera within this tribe include: Biolib * Aflexia Oman, 1949 * Alapus De Long & Sleesman, 1929 * Deltocephalus Burmeister, 1838 * Endria Oman, 1949 * Maiestas Distant, 1917 * Recilia Edwards, 1922 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Deltocephalinae Category:Hemiptera tribes
title: Deltocephalini
